WRITING.TEXT: Its plausible that Jerome would be able to guess it, in the real life middle age times, the bastard sons of princes and kings were often made nobles and given military commissions even if their true parentage was an official secret.

I think [laser drives are the current best bet for fast space travel. Its feasible to have a spacecraft travel from earth to Mars in 3 days using laser drives.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kBHQcArA1fM) Nuclear pulse propulsion can produce similar high rates of speed, and the capability to produce a nuclear pulse propulsion powered spacecraft has been around since the 1960's, but the general public is to against it for it to be implemented. [NASA is currently working on nuclear-thermal drives for the Orion program](https://youtu.be/dgILm5veFs0), but these still have transit times to mars of months rather than days a photonic or nuclear pulse drive could produce.
The current reactors India has in use only use thorium on an experimental scale

WRITING.TEXT: India has massive reserves [of Thorium, which can be used in breeder reactors to produce energy. The United States once built such a reactor for research.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tgkkj1JFO0M) If India can master the technology required to build Thorium cycle nuclear reactors, and also develop reprocessing technology, it has in its possession a fuel source that can meet its power needs for the long term.

When Guts hears a description of Gaeseric's appearance from Charlotte, he himself thinks that it sounds quite similar to Skull Knight.
Rickert was childish, he was a child. Isidoro, Isma, and Sheirke are childish, because they are children. I don't know about you, but i think a reader would expect children to act childish at points.
Alot of the apostles are virtually human in appearance in their non-monsterous forms. Grundbeld, Ervine, ect would appear to be human to the ordinary individual.
"...some half-assed, fluffy kind of bullshit" - quote of the episode right there. Berserk one liners are awesome!
Its just like people wanted it, exactly like the 1997 Anime! The 90's anime was loaded with still frames and panning shots of still frames.
900 Godhand is way more plausible than Gaiseric being Guts from the future
So maybe then Tonio... was actually a bad man afterall

I do agree it could use more music at some points, it would be cool if they used [actual medival music for the happier parts](https://youtu.be/eueV7Jo3QdI?t=9) and for the horrific parts, stuff like [electric wizard would work well.](https://youtu.be/cH9OqfWQslg?t=18) and for the boat trip, i could see some sea themed postmodern stuff like [Big Sea by 5ive](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vT1JCkn51Ew) or [Advant Garde Luxury by RMFTM](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cP6GKPvEXQo) working well.

I mean, the manga doesnt really linger on with panels of atmopheric [dusty nothingness.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MbAUPpikBBE) The only panels that seem to be lingering to me are the ones where [Miura blatently shows Farnese's lingering eyes staring at ol Gatsu.](http://imgur.com/a/6B0JN)

I never knew that Zodd, Skullface, and Void use archaic japanese when speaking, as such it would seem to me that in the english translations they should be translated as speaking middle or even old english rather than modern english (though if it were old english, virtually no one would be able to read it anyways lol)
They haven't been rushing anything, like i said before, they are pretty much following the manga right on at this point, if it seems rushed, then its rushed in the manga as well.
This season has not been rushed at all, they are following the manga pretty closely so far this season

Interestingly enough, the existance of the under-ice city was not top-secret, but rather its purpose was! [The military created a fake story about building it for research purposes, when in actuallity it was to be a network of giant underground ICBM launch facilities aimed at sending nukes into the Soviet Union in the case of WWIII.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Project_Iceworm)
